questions.quote: I'll tell ya, if I ever get out of here, I'm gonna change my life. I'm gonna do a whole Zen thing. Take up yoga, meditate.. I'll eat right. Calm down, lose my anger..  Hey, is anybody listening?!
Maybe instead of trying to satisfy two of your needs, how about satisfying one of somebody else's.
This is not good. World's are colliding! George is getting upset!
All right, I'll get ya a Mounds bar. Keep the engine running.
I am lying down. I am trapped under a funky mattress. I gotta go get a doctor or at least come over and roll this thing off of me.
You know what you ought to do? Go see my friend Dwayne at J & T Optical on Columbus Avenue. He'll give you thirty percent off.
Oh yeah, he was drinking something, it started to come out of his nose.
You can't pick up anything with these! There's no absorption!
And I think he's been telling his friends. I got invitations to six more Bar Mitzvahs.
Jerry, we're friends! We can't do that, it would ruin our friendship.
